dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, you have got to hear this. Like, this is actually huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, you have got to hear this. Like, this is actually huge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Is it? Another digital announcement? I can almost feel my eyes glazing over already.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Is it? Another digital announcement? I can almost feel my eyes glazing over already.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, seriously! Madiyev, the Minister, he just dropped this thing about eGov. You can now check how many mobile numbers are registered to your IIN.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, seriously! Madiyev, the Minister, he just dropped this thing about eGov. You can now check how many mobile numbers are registered to your I I N.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A new function has appeared in eGov for checking the number of registered mobile numbers for one IIN. This was reported by the Minister of Digital Development, Innovations, and Aerospace Industry, Zhaslan Madiyev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: My... IIN. Right. And why, uh, why would I care about that? I know my phone number.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: My... I I N. Right. And why, uh, why would I care about that? I know my phone number.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but see, that's the point! What if someone, like, fraudulently registered a SIM card under your name? For, you know, scams or something.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but see, that's the point! What if someone, like, fraudulently registered a S I M card under your name? For, you know, scams or something.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: laughs Scammers. Of course. Because this new feature is totally going to stop the grand masters of internet fraud.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Scammers. Of course. Because this new feature is totally going to stop the grand masters of internet fraud.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, but he specifically said it's for fighting internet fraudsters! And, uh, illegal SIM registration. It's a tool!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, but he specifically said it's for fighting internet fraudsters! And, uh, illegal S I M registration. It's a tool!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Speaking about the fight against Internet fraudsters, Madiyev said that a new function has appeared in eGov that will help fight illegal registration of mobile numbers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A tool. Okay. So, I log in, I type in my IIN, and then what? It tells me I have three numbers when I only use one?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A tool. Okay. So, I log in, I type in my I I N, and then what? It tells me I have three numbers when I only use one?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And if you see that, if it doesn't match your actual numbers, you can immediately contact your mobile operator.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And if you see that, if it doesn't match your actual numbers, you can immediately contact your mobile operator.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If you see that the number does not correspond to your actually used numbers, then you can immediately contact the mobile operator and find out this circumstance,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, immediately. Right after I wait on hold for, like, an hour. Or two.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, immediately. Right after I wait on hold for, like, an hour. Or two.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's about being proactive! It gives you the information, uh, to do something about it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's about being proactive! It gives you the information, uh, to do something about it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Or, like, another thing to worry about that I didn't even know was a problem.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or, like, another thing to worry about that I didn't even know was a problem.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it could be a problem! Think about identity theft, man! This is a step towards, um, protecting yourself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it could be a problem! Think about identity theft, man! This is a step towards, um, protecting yourself.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I guess. It just feels like putting the onus on us, you know? To fix what someone else broke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I guess. It just feels like putting the onus on us, you know? To fix what someone else broke.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But at least you can fix it now! Before, you wouldn't even know! It's a genuine improvement, don't you think?

dialogue_turns.text: I don't know, B. It just sounds like more homework. More hoops to jump through.
